name: CSV
description: Import a Comma-Seperated Values file or multiple CSV files in a ZIP file.

properties.name: Headers
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the file starts with a header line.

properties.name: Separator
properties.description: Type of the separator between values

properties.name: Force
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the merging of different files should happen even if they do not have strictly identical columns.

properties.name: Add namespace
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the factors name should be prefixed by the step namespace.
